value:
Mortals seem fond of garments that
fail to defend against the sunlight.

This heat annoys me. Not unlike
the flame god...whom I would rather
not think of.

Is Fjorm here? A location like this
is meant for mortals...

Tell me about this frozen treat...
It's not bad... In fact, I rather enjoy it.
Bring me more.

If I were to freeze the sea, this place
might be easier to bear...

I am Nifl. I've brought a frozen treat,
from $Nf.

I understand now, the pleasure
of a quiet beach.

If I wished it so, winter would arrive
on these sunny shores.

It is not only hot but noisy as well...
I am not meant for this.

Although I would rather avoid bearing
such heat, I do appreciate this.

Why would you summon me to this
wretched inferno? Choose your
answer wisely.

The pleasure of the sun is wasted
on me.$k$pFor me, relaxation is a cold space
where time itself seems to stand still.$k$pThe frozen treats one can find here,
however, are wonderful.$k$pEnjoying them under the sun even
adds to the experience somehow.
An impressive mortal achievement.$k$pHm... Next time Fjorm ought to
accompany me here.$k$pNot that I plan to return... But if I did,
her presence may help me stave off
the boredom... Nothing more.
Move.
Presumptuous.
To the icy depths!
No more play.
I must...recede...
Sigh...
Avert your gaze.
Mmh... Do not touch me.
The sun here... I will surely melt.
"Icy"? I will show you how cold I can be.
The constant rhythm of the waves is a soothing presence.
Fjorm would likely enjoy the tropical scenery...
I am...not bored. Let that suffice.
Very well.
This...heat...
I will finish it.
